title: What is Katarina's best build combination?

replies.body: As a fellow katarina player that build is looking quite solid though from my personal experiance you should not get crystal sypter on her as it just isnt worth it, also only get the mr / ap item if you are behind in lane vs ap or if you are getting poked a lot.

firecape and orb walk

>next tier strategy only with zilean on team get all the xp boosts lvl 7 vs 5 is ur entire eyeball

ur build sucx

is bronze pub
